mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,a.score,a.vipid,b.name,b.discount from t_user a inner join t_vip b on a.vipid=b.id where a.code=#{username} and a.password=#{password} and a.status=1
select num from t_cart where customer_id=#{customerId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: update t_cart set num=num+#{num} where customer_id=#{customerId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_cart where customer_id=#{customerId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.update: update t_cart set num=num-#{num} where customer_id=#{customerId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.select: select b.discount from t_customer a inner join t_vip b on a.vipid=b.id where a.customer_id=#{customerId}

select a.customer_id,a.goods_id,c.name,b.gno,b.name,b.spec,d.name,b.unit,b.price_sale,b.price_sale*#{disCount} as price_vip from t_cart a inner join t_goods b on a.goods_id=b.id inner join t_dictionary c on b.dict_id=c.id inner join t_producer d on b.pro_id=d.id where a.customer_id=#{id}
select id from t_order where orderno=#{orderNo}
mapper.update: update t_order set price_sale=(select sum(b.price_sale*a.num) from t_orderdetail a inner join t_goods b on a.goods_id=b.id where a.order_id=#{orderId}), price_vip=(select sum(b.price_sale*a.num*#{disCount}) from t_orderdetail a inner join t_goods b on a.goods_id=b.id where a.order_id=#{orderId}) where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select * from t_order where user_type=2 and user_id=#{customerId}
mapper.update: update t_customer set score=score+(select score from t_goods where id=#{goodsId})*#{num} where id=#{customerId}
update t_customer a set vipid=(select max(b.id) from t_vip b where b.score_min<=a.score) where id=#{customerId}
